title: How does LOR work in PESU?
content:
I've asked a few teachers for LOR, and they have told me to draft it. How does it work now? I've sent the drafts, will they edit it and make it professional by adding letter-head and all that? Or should I do that too? Cuz this feels really weird lol.

Any senior/current aspirant who has gone through this hell, please enlighten me.

comments.body:
So yeah, you gotta type your own LOR and give it to your professor. They'll suggest any changes/additions/subtractions and also share the "formal format"

Post that, the department will print it out on Bond Paper (i hope they still do it) and give you, but you'll be mostly using the digital copy, so it's fine if you don't get the print out
Thanks for your reply and insight!
